00034 #include <exception>
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 #include <sstream>
00037 #include <cerrno>
00038 #include <unistd.h>
00039 
00040 #include "cvq.h"
00041 
00042 using namespace std;
00043 
00044 const char *me = NULL;
00045 /*
00046  *
00047  */
00048 void usage()
00049 {
00050     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<< " [options] (domain)*"<<endl
00051         <<"-q\tquiet mode"<<endl
00052         <<"-m number\tset default quota for users in given domain (default 0 - turn off)"<<endl
00053         <<"-s\tsystem, set default quota for new domains"<<endl
00054         <<endl
00055         <<"Changes space limit for domains or users that will be add."<<endl
00056         <<"It does not modify existing objects."<<endl;
00057 }
00058 
00059 /*
00060  *
00061  */
00062 int main(int ac, char **av)
00063 {
00064     me = *av;
00065     try {
00066             int opt;
00067             istringstream is;
00068             cvq::quota_value qm=0;
00069             bool quiet=false, system=false;
00070             while( (opt=getopt(ac,av,"sqm:h")) != -1 ) {
00071                     switch(opt) {
00072                     case 'q':
00073                             quiet=true;
00074                             break;
00075                     case 'm':
00076                             is.clear();
00077                             is.str(optarg);
00078                             is>>qm;
00079                             if(!is) {
00080                                     usage();
00081                                     return(2);
00082                             }
00083                             break;
00084                     case 's':
00085                             system = true;
00086                             break;
00087                     default:        
00088                     case '?':
00089                     case 'h':
00090                             usage();
00091                             return(1);
00092                     }
00093             }
00094             ac -= optind;
00095             av += optind;
00096 
00097             cvq *vq(cvq::alloc());
00098 
00099             uint8_t ret;
00100             if(system) {
00101                     ret = vq->qt_dom_def_set(qm);
00102                     if(ret) {
00103                             if(!quiet)
00104                                     cout<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00105                             else return(ret);
00106                     } else if(!quiet) {
00107                             cout<<"Default domain's quota was set."<<endl;
00108                     }
00109             }
00110             
00111             if( ! ac ) {
00112                     if(system) return(0);
00113                     usage();
00114                     return(1);
00115             }
00116             if(quiet) ac = 1;
00117             for(int i=0; i < ac; i++ ) {
00118                     if(!quiet) cout<<av[i]<<": ";
00119                     ret = vq->qt_def_set(av[i], qm);
00120                     if(ret) {
00121                             if(!quiet)
00122                                     cout<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00123                             else return(ret);
00124                     } else {
00125                             if(!quiet)
00126                                     cout<<"Default user's quota was set."<<endl;
00127                     }
00128             }
00129     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00130             cerr << "exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00131             return 1;
00132     }
00133     return 0;
00134 }
